title: [At Home With the Churchills]
other_title: Menzies R.G : Menzies Wartime Tour Home Movie
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Home movies and video
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Personal narratives, Australian
abstract: Robert Menzies' home movie of the Churchills.
description: This unique and rare home movie clip, filmed by Australia’s Prime Minister Sir Robert Menzies in 1941, opens with a shot of Mrs Clementine Churchill in curlers waving out a window to the camera. Additional classic footage taken of Sir Winston Churchill smoking his cigar along with shots of Sir Robert talking to Sir Winston. Source: Australian Screen Online
